alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 26 at 9:46AM MST until January 27 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. Areas of blowing snow with visibility reduced to under a half mile at times. * WHERE...South Laramie Range and South Laramie Range Foothills including Vedauwoo and Buford. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. Areas of blowing snow will produce slick roads and poor visibility.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
